name: GRAM BOWMAN’S PIE CRUST MUFFINS
instructions: Use glass to cut into round shaped pastry
Place in the bottom of muffin pan
Fill with strawberry preserves or apricot any kind of preserves that you like.
Use box or homemade* white cake mix added on top of preserves
*Eddie prefers homemade. Usually made from scraps when making pies.

warnings: GRAM BOWMAN’S PIE CRUST MUFFINS: Missing ingredients
